bug.author: treuille
bug.summary: Interacting with widgets shouldn't change the vertical scroll position
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Interacting with widgets sometimes changes the vertical scroll position. This shouldn't be the case. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
It would be great if someone could post an SSCCE of this issue! In the meantime, to see an example, please <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit-old-private/issues/1238>see this bug from our previous repo</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
The vertical scroll position should not change. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
It does. <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: Streamlit v0.45.0 Browser version: Chrome Version 76.0 (from chrome://version/)

comments.comment: For people with access to our old repo, here's the previous version of this bug: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit-old-private/issues/1238>streamlit/streamlit-old-private#1238</denchmark-link> . (It's kept private because it contains customer info.)
